alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 31 at 10:56PM EDT until April 01 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation, changing to all snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches, greatest to the east of Iron River, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Northeast winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Iron and Dickinson Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds, in combination with wet, heavy snow, may lead to downed tree limbs and power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
